mapper.select: SELECT CRP.REPAIR_NO, -- 수리번호 CRP.FACILITY_NO, -- 설비번호 CRP.REQ_NO, -- 요청번호 CRP.START_DT, -- 시작일시 CRP.END_DT, -- 종료일시 CD1.CODE_NM AS STATUS, -- 상태 CD2.CODE_NM AS CAUSE, -- 설비수리사유 CD3.CODE_NM AS REPAIR_TYPE -- 설비수리항목 FROM CMM_REPAIR AS CRP -- 설비수리 LEFT OUTER JOIN MDM_CODE AS CD1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON (CD1.CATEGORY_ID = 'IPP' AND CRP.STATUS = CD1.SUB_CD1) LEFT OUTER JOIN MDM_CODE AS CD2 WITH(NOLOCK) ON (CRP.CAUSE_CD = CD2.CODE) -- 설비수리사유: CD2.CATEGORY_ID = 'ARC' LEFT OUTER JOIN MDM_CODE AS CD3 WITH(NOLOCK) ON (CRP.REPAIR_TYPE_CD = CD3.CODE) -- 설비수리항목: CD3.CATEGORY_ID = 'ARI' ORDER BY CRP.REPAIR_NO

SELECT CRP.REPAIR_NO, -- 수리번호 CRP.FACILITY_NO, -- 설비번호 CRP.REQ_NO, -- 요청번호 CRP.START_DT, -- 시작일시 CRP.END_DT, -- 종료일시 CD1.CODE_NM AS STATUS, -- 상태 CD2.CODE_NM AS CAUSE, -- 설비수리사유 CD3.CODE_NM AS REPAIR_TYPE -- 설비수리항목 FROM CMM_REPAIR AS CRP -- 설비수리 LEFT OUTER JOIN MDM_CODE AS CD1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON (CD1.CATEGORY_ID = 'IPP' AND CRP.STATUS = CD1.SUB_CD1) LEFT OUTER JOIN MDM_CODE AS CD2 WITH(NOLOCK) ON (CRP.CAUSE_CD = CD2.CODE) -- 설비수리사유: CD2.CATEGORY_ID = 'ARC' LEFT OUTER JOIN MDM_CODE AS CD3 WITH(NOLOCK) ON (CRP.REPAIR_TYPE_CD = CD3.CODE) WHERE CRP.FACILITY_NO= #{facility_no} ORDER BY CRP.REPAIR_NO
